name: Kids
text: إِنَّمَا|Indeed, what|108|188|102$تُوعَدُونَ|you are promised|133|294|6059$لَصَادِقٌ|(is) surely true,|123|203|16110$

name: Kids
text: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|179|713$ٱلدِّينَ|the Judgment|110|272|1208$لَوَٲقِعٌ|(is) surely to occur.|152|233|16111$

name: Kids
text: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ|And in the hours before dawn|216|276|16124$هُمْ|they|50|170|49$يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ|would ask forgiveness,|170|230|7244$

name: Kids
text: وَفِىٓ|And in|62|74|487$أَمْوَٲلِهِمْ|their wealth|99|123|3955$حَقٌّ|(was the) right|120|144|3076$لِّلسَّآئِلِ|(of) those who asked|162|186|16125$وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ|and the deprived.|137|149|16126$

name: Kids
text: وَفِى|And in|62|101|487$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|171|100$ءَايَـٰتٌ|(are) signs|91|170|2618$لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ|for those who are certain,|194|233|16127$

name: Kids
text: وَفِى|And in|62|82|487$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the heaven|95|135|157$رِزْقُكُمْ|(is) your provision|139|179|16128$وَمَا|and what|82|122|46$تُوعَدُونَ|you are promised.|138|158|6059$

name: Kids
text: هَلْ|Has|50|57|1829$أَتَـٰكَ|reached you|102|116|11347$حَدِيثُ|(the) narration|118|132|11348$ضَيْفِ|(of the) guests|121|135|9793$إِبْرَٲهِيمَ|(of) Ibrahim|98|112|1127$ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ|the honored?|114|121|14472$

name: Kids
text: فَأَوْجَسَ|Then he felt|101|124|11507$مِنْهُمْ|from them|87|133|730$خِيفَةً‌ۖ|a fear.|65|111|8604$قَالُواْ|They said,|89|135|101$لَا|`(Do) not|84|130|30$تَخَفْ‌ۖ|fear,`|70|93|8605$وَبَشَّرُوهُ|and they gave him glad tidings|223|299|16133$بِغُلَـٰمٍ|of a son|74|226|9797$عَلِيمٍ|learned.|73|149|8258$

name: Kids
text: فَأَقْبَلَتِ|Then came forward|148|163|16134$ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ|his wife|98|128|16135$فِى|with|48|78|89$صَرَّةٍ|a loud voice,|105|135|16136$فَصَكَّتْ|and struck|92|122|16137$وَجْهَهَا|her face|84|99|16138$وَقَالَتْ|and she said,|108|201|2998$عَجُوزٌ|`An old woman|120|306|8614$عَقِيمٌ|barren!`|75|168|16139$

name: Kids
text: ۞ قَالَ|He said,|96|127|309$فَمَا|`Then what|99|162|132$خَطْبُكُمْ|(is) your mission,|133|196|9804$أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ|O messengers?`|159|190|9805$

name: Kids
text: مُّسَوَّمَةً|Marked|89|166|8668$عِندَ رَبِّكَ|by your Lord|108|261|16141$لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ|for the transgressors.`|172|248|8046$

name: Kids
text: وَتَرَكْنَا|And We left|98|115|8864$فِيهَآ|therein|66|101|253$ءَايَةً|a Sign|61|96|2339$لِّلَّذِينَ|for those who|112|147|750$يَخَافُونَ|fear|92|127|4859$ٱلْعَذَابَ|the punishment|122|139|1442$ٱلْأَلِيمَ|the painful.|95|95|8290$

name: Kids
text: فَتَوَلَّىٰ|But he turned away|151|177|6564$بِرُكْنِهِۦ|with his supporters|146|198|16143$وَقَالَ|and said,|80|132|1089$سَـٰحِرٌ|`A magician|99|151|14763$أَوْ|or|41|67|154$مَجْنُونٌ|a madman.`|100|100|15581$

name: Kids
text: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ|So We took him|124|141|13461$وَجُنُودَهُۥ|and his hosts|108|142|13462$فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ|and threw them|125|159|13463$فِى|into|48|82|89$ٱلْيَمِّ|the sea,|75|109|6765$وَهُوَ|while he|74|91|305$مُلِيمٌ|(was) blameworthy.|152|152|14712$

name: Kids
text: فَعَتَوْاْ|But they rebelled|133|154|16149$عَنْ|against|68|109|1105$أَمْرِ|(the) Command|122|163|10521$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord,|118|159|54$فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ|so seized them|119|140|4598$ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ|the thunderbolt|123|212|530$وَهُمْ|while they|88|266|256$يَنظُرُونَ|were looking.|107|196|1830$

name: Kids
text: فَمَا|Then not|80|86|132$ٱسْتَطَـٰعُواْ|they were able|119|132|1902$مِن|to|50|63|53$قِيَامٍ|stand|57|70|16150$وَمَا|and not|71|84|46$كَانُواْ|they could|90|103|94$مُنتَصِرِينَ|help themselves.|131|137|16151$

name: Kids
text: وَقَوْمَ|And the people|120|138|12771$نُوحٍ|(of) Nuh|75|110|4641$مِّن قَبْلُ‌ۖ|before them;|106|141|250$إِنَّهُمْ|indeed, they|103|138|106$كَانُواْ|were|69|104|94$قَوْمًا|a people|76|94|3073$فَـٰسِقِينَ|defiantly disobedient.|162|162|7658$

name: Kids
text: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ|And the Heaven|126|163|199$بَنَيْنَـٰهَا|We constructed it|140|214|16036$بِأَيْيْدٍ|with strength,|114|188|16152$وَإِنَّا|and indeed, We|123|160|682$لَمُوسِعُونَ|(are) surely (its) Expanders.|207|207|16153$

name: Kids
text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ|And the earth,|117|141|2280$فَرَشْنَـٰهَا|We have spread it,|146|194|16154$فَنِعْمَ|how excellent|111|159|9441$ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ|(are) the Spreaders.|156|180|16155$

name: Kids
text: أَتَوَاصَوْاْ بِهِۦ‌ۚ|Have they transmitted it to them?|247|260|16157$بَلْ|Nay,|50|75|848$هُمْ|they|50|75|49$قَوْمٌ|(are) a people|114|139|4788$طَاغُونَ|transgressing.|113|126|16158$

name: Kids
text: وَمَا|And not|72|106|46$خَلَقْتُ|I have created|118|186|14901$ٱلْجِنَّ|the jinn|70|138|5898$وَٱلْإِنسَ|and the mankind|129|197|16160$إِلَّا|except|65|99|86$لِيَعْبُدُونِ|that they worship Me.|167|167|16161$

name: Kids
text: فَإِنَّ|So indeed,|90|107|599$لِلَّذِينَ|for those who|112|146|750$ظَلَمُواْ|do wrong,|86|120|558$ذَنُوبًا|(is) a portion|106|140|16166$مِّثْلَ|like|57|91|1052$ذَنُوبِ|(the) portion|105|122|16167$أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ|(of) their companions,|167|298|16168$فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ|so let them not ask Me to hasten.|247|378|16169$
